channel.title: [Req] Banner/logo for my website
channel.description:
Hey people Mupescape here :D I'm going to be as descriptive as possible with this post but I'm wondering if someone will help me make a Banner/Logo for my website,my last thread I was wasn't completely explaind enough. [b]Words for logo:[/b] "Runescape Quest Helping" (No quotes). [b]Font:[/b] [IMG]http://i180.photobucket.com/albums/x303/mystickid2k6/TEXT-1.png[/img] [b]EDIT:[/b] The maker of this font (Granpy - Piczo website codes) told me it was impact but with drop shadow and I forgot what else..Although I have nothing to make this I'de appreciate it if someone could help me make this. [b]Theme:[/b]
I want a banner for a RS tips site. A logo with some dragon armor or loads of cash would be nice. Something that conveys wealth.
Something like that but... With Runescape armour not really sure any fancy kind of armour, some cash and like a Quest symbol to the side, you see my website is going to be a QuestHelping website if you already haven't know. [b]Image Colour:[/b] Same colour as the text in the font I've shown above "Navtiation" one but I want only text to be that color, and for the items, cash and quest symbol, I want it to be kind of blurred/transparent and also a black background will be fine :). [b]Image texture:[/b] None, nothing special. [b]Image size:[/b] 456 x 189 Hope this wouldn't be to much work.. I'll accept any kind of work as long as its sweet looking :D Please, tell me if I'm not describing it well enough because I can edit this to try and make it more clearly. Sincerly, Mupescape.

item.title: [Req] Banner/logo for my website
item.dc:creator: @Mupescape Mupescape
item.description:
@Mupescape wrote:

ThAt0n36Uy:

First, I’d like to thank you for making a clear cut request. Second, the fonts are nothing alike. Third, I’d like to see the website before I make a banner for it. To get an idea what I’m designing it for exactly.

My bad if fonts are nothing alike…but can I get a font atleast that looks like the bottom one then.

Mupescape:

you see my website is going to be a QuestHelping website if you already haven’t know.

I already told you Its for a Quest Help site, it was on piczo at one point but I going to move it to freewebs and start from scratch, but anyway here if you want link: http://www.runescapequesthelping.piczo.com (Do not report me please he asked.) and I haven’t updated news in a while, because I was really the only one working on it.

Read full topic
